name: Carlo Pellacani
membership: I am not member of any association or similars.
goal: I had a long experience as a consultant for technological innovation and, after retirement, I seldom assist SMEs or Medium Size Companies on that subject. Normally I simply ask them to refund my travels expenses as I hate doing nothing and I love brainstorms on new industrial products in my field of competence.
interests: Competition, Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
SMEs financing projects in support of innovation.
I will be responsible for the communicatios with EU and for writing the request for support.
The company (SME) I am assisting asks me to represent them in Brussels.
